name: The fall home
description:
Submission for the Pizza Jam 2019.

The ending chosen was "The fall home " (#226).

Build your house room by room but try to keep it in one piece !

Put furniture inside your room and close your room by putting another room above to make point !

Controls:

Left Arrow - Right Arrow: Move the room or the piece of furniture you're holding

Space: Drop the room or the piece of furniture.
